title: Update hero/tidbit block: change 'Dr. Shane J Charbonnet' (line 2) to 'Dr. Shane JC'

requirements.summary: Update the standalone name display on line 2 of the hero/intro tidbit block from 'Dr. Shane J Charbonnet' to 'Dr. Shane JC' without altering any other text in the block
acceptanceCriteria: The second line of the tidbit/intro block reads exactly 'Dr. Shane JC'.
The heading line 'A Tidbit About Dr. Shane JC' is unchanged.
'Simply Shane Designs (c)sm', 'Innovator • Educator • Author', and the bio paragraph are unchanged.
No other component or page section is affected by this change.

file_operations.description: Locate the tidbit/intro block within the Hero component and update the standalone name text on line 2 from 'Dr. Shane J Charbonnet' (or any variant such as 'Dr. Shane J. Charbonnet') to 'Dr. Shane JC'. Preserve all other text including the heading, tagline, copyright notice, and bio paragraph. Do not modify layout, styling, or any other visual properties.
